duties_responsibilities.duty: This position will be responsible for providing customer product support, testing, implementation and product demonstrations.
Managing customer expectations through the implementation process by tracking all stages of the implementation.
Serving as a customer consultant and ensuring implementation deadlines are achieved.
Communicating with customers with regards to any implementation problems or customer concerns and working with internal team to resolve issues.
Operating under minimal supervision with wide latitude for independent action.
Reviewing contract details and specific contract requirements to ensure company meets all contractual obligations during the implementation process.
Staying informed of project progress and identifying and minimizing potential risks.
Informing appropriate internal personnel of any problems or concerns expressed by customers.
Providing project management expertise and customer account representation as the implementation progresses.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or equivalent work experience in skilled nursing facility or long term care corporate office.
